title: looking for the old oxford font to download
content: I am looking to see if the old Oxford font (the one with lowercase letters, rounded edges and multiple lines) made by Face Photosetting, which goes under a different name can be downloaded from the Internet. There's a picture of it at [http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide05.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232738/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide05.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide05.html")
author: munchkinthecat
